Detailed Description

Struct to hold discovered flash parameters.

Field Documentation

uint32_t NOR_INFO_::blockSize[CFI_MAXREGIONS]

Size of the blocks in a region

uint32_t NOR_INFO_::bufferSize

Size of write buffer

uint8_t NOR_INFO_::busWidth

8-bit or 16-bit bus width

uint8_t NOR_INFO_::chipOperatingWidth

The operating width of each chip

NOR_CmdSet NOR_INFO_::commandSet

command set id (see CFI documentation)

uint8_t NOR_INFO_::CSOffset

index of what CS region are we in

uint16_t NOR_INFO_::devID1

Device ID

uint16_t NOR_INFO_::devID2

Used for AMD 3-byte ID devices

uint32_t NOR_INFO_::flashBase

32-bit address of flash start

uint32_t NOR_INFO_::flashSize

Size of NOR flash regions in bytes (numberDevices * size of one device)

NOR_ManfID NOR_INFO_::manfID

Manufacturer's ID

uint8_t NOR_INFO_::maxTotalWidth

Maximum extent of width of all chips combined - determines offset shifts

uint32_t NOR_INFO_::numberBlocks[CFI_MAXREGIONS]

Number of blocks in a region

uint8_t NOR_INFO_::numberDevices

Number of deives used in parallel

uint8_t NOR_INFO_::numberRegions

Number of regions of contiguous regions of same block size
